price: Nuti yeroo gabaabaaf adabbii saaqoodha; Isin (kufriitti) deebi’oodha.
arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابِ قَلِيلًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ عَآئِدُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: innā kāshifū al-ʿadhābi qalīlan innakum ʿāidūna
